project_plan.name: CSV Data Analysis Tool in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file
Implement functionality to input numerical columns from the user
Calculate and display the mean for specified columns
Calculate and display the median for specified columns
Calculate and display the mode for specified columns
Write tests for the entire functionality provided above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
